file_content.text: The looted tomb of another Sith Lord. I once thought these ancient temples held the secrets to immortality. I was wrong.
You seem to have found a way.
You learned it somewhere.
The body is just a shell... a vessel for the spirit.
And what about the face you wear now?
And Valkorion?
I found Valkorion centuries ago. He was a great warrior. A champion of ancient Zakuul. It was only natural I hollow him out to use as my vessel.
I see plenty of flaws in Zakuul.
What perfection?
The glory of the Eternal Empire has been tainted by my children, but it can be restored.
When you take the throne, you will understand.
We still need to go deeper if we hope to find another passage to the surface.
Bey'wan? Now's not a good time.
This can't wait. Saresh just sent a message. She's heading here. To Odessen.
Seems she didn't wait for us to change our minds after all.
Send her packing the second she lands.
Some of the troops want to hear her out. They aren't sure the Alliance can last. There are... rumors... about the commander.
Remind them where their loyalties lie.
Stall Saresh. We're on our way.
Minister Lorman warned us you might sneak off.
Why is it that all Sith believe they can live forever?
Sith obsess over immortality.
The search for immortality is a dangerous one.
A perilous quest.
Emperor of the Sith was my first face, but it is merely one of many I have worn.
Do not mistake me for the fools who seek immortality out of blind ego.
Many Sith have been able to escape death.
We can live on as spirits.
For a time, but none have achieved as true a mastery of death as I have.
I saw potential in the primitive world, so I raised it to perfection.
And now you wear no face at all. You're trapped.
Now you're nothing.
My fate is tied to yours because I choose it. No one can command the Eternal Empire but you.
Clearly you weren't satisfied just being the Sith Emperor.
Emperor wasn't good enough?
The Sith Empire was too corrupted for me to save, but Zakuul... Zakuul was different.
You speak of Zakuul as though it's your favored child.
Is that pride I hear?
I have no time for your nostalgia, old man.
Enough of this.
The Eternal Empire deserves more than my children ever did.
You will need to know the Eternal Empire at its core if you ever hope to rule it.
Only to those limited by their own flesh. I have transcended.
This way. We're getting closer.
